metadata.name: PsExec Service Execution
metadata.comment: Detects launch of the PSEXESVC service, which means that this system was the target of a psexec remote execution

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\psexesvc.exe') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('psexesvc.exe'))

output.summary: Detects launch of the PSEXESVC service, which means that this system was the target of a psexec remote execution

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administrative tasks References: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sysinternals/downloads/psexec, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ro2QuZTIMBM
